name: FRigVMFunction_TimeLoop
doc: Simulates a time value - and outputs loop information

Duration: the duration of a single loop in seconds
Normalize:
if set to true the output relative and flipflop
will be normalized over the duration.
Relative: the relative time in seconds (within the loop)
FlipFlop:
the relative time in seconds (within the loop),
going from 0 to duration and then back from duration to 0,
or 0 to 1 and 1 to 0 if Normalize is turned on
Even: true if the iteration of the loop is even
